input_text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Rachel: Hey Jack. How were your classes this semester?
Lisa: They were not too bad. I really liked my poli-sci class.
Rachel: Would you consider it your favorite class?
Lisa: I don't know if I would call it my favorite, but it ranks up there.
Rachel: What class was your favorite then?
Lisa: I took a business communication class last year and it was terrific.
Rachel: I never took that yet. If that was your favorite, I think I will check it out.

Now write a summary of the conversation:
input_text.Response A: Lisa took a business communication class last year and it was her favourite. She also liked her political science class this semester. Rachel will check the business communication class out.
input_text.Response B: Lisa and Rachel talk about Lisa's classes and Lisa recommends a class to Rachel.

label_annotations.factors_a: No - the factors listed were all that was needed to rate this response.
label_annotations.feedback: Response A was an excellent response, it was both concise while still including all the important information.
